control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined measures] to ensure that long-term audit records generated by the information system can be retrieved.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization accepts the results of an assessment of [Assignment: organization-defined information system] performed by [Assignment: organization-defined external organization] when the assessment meets [Assignment: organization-defined requirements].

Control Statement: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined measures] to ensure that long-term audit records generated by the information system can be retrieved.
